pp1.6:2.1: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhati, tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti balesu ca vasībhāvaṁ.
pp1.6:2.2: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhati, na ca tattha sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti na ca balesu vasībhāvaṁ.
pp1.6:2.3: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati, diṭṭhe ceva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti sāvakapāramiñca pāpuṇāti.
pp1.6:2.4: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati, diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, na ca sāvakapāramiṁ pāpuṇāti.
pp1.6:2.5: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati, na ca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, anāgāmī hoti anāgantā itthattaṁ.
pp1.6:2.6: Atthekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati, na ca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, āgāmī hoti āgantā itthattaṁ.
